00080 #ifndef _cfe_evs_task_
00081 #define _cfe_evs_task_
00082 
00083 /********************************** Include Files  ************************************/
00084 #include "common_types.h"      /* Basic data types */
00085 #include "cfe_sb.h"            /* Software Bus library function definitions */
00086 #include "cfe_msgids.h"        /* Software Bus Message ID definitions */
00087 #include "cfe_es.h"            /* Memory Pool definitions */
00088 #include "cfe_platform_cfg.h"  /* cFE platform configuration definitions */
00089 #include "osapi.h"             /* OS definitions */
00090 #include "cfe_evs_msg.h"        /* EVS message definitions */
00091 #include "cfe_evs_verify.h"
00092 #include "cfe_evs.h"
00093 #include "cfe_evs_events.h"
00094 
00095 /*********************  Macro and Constant Type Definitions   ***************************/
00096 
00097 #define CFE_EVS_MSG_TRUNCATED           '$'
00098 #define CFE_EVS_FREE_SLOT               (-1)
00099 #define CFE_EVS_NO_MASK                 0
00100 #define CFE_EVS_PIPE_DEPTH              32
00101 #define CFE_EVS_MSG_LIMIT               4
00102 #define CFE_EVS_MAX_EVENT_SEND_COUNT    65535
00103 #define CFE_EVS_MAX_FILTER_COUNT        65535
00104 #define CFE_EVS_PIPE_NAME               "EVS_CMD_PIPE"
00105 #define CFE_EVS_UNDEF_APPID             0xFFFFFFFF
00106 #define CFE_EVS_MAX_PORT_MSG_LENGTH     (CFE_EVS_MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH+OS_MAX_API_NAME+30)
00107 
00108 /* Since CFE_EVS_MAX_PORT_MSG_LENGTH is the size of the buffer that is sent to 
00109  * print out (using OS_printf), we need to check to make sure that the buffer 
00110  * size the OS uses is big enough. This check has to be made here because it is
00111  * the first spot after CFE_EVS_MAX_PORT_MSG_LENGTH is defined */
00112 #if OS_BUFFER_SIZE < CFE_EVS_MAX_PORT_MSG_LENGTH 
00113     #error CFE_EVS_MAX_PORT_MSG_LENGTH cannot be greater than OS_BUFFER_SIZE!
00114 #endif
00115 
00116 
00117 /************************  Internal Structure Definitions  *****************************/
00118 
00119 typedef struct
00120 {
00121    int16               EventID;     /* Numerical event identifier */
00122    uint16              Mask;        /* Binary filter mask */
00123    uint16              Count;       /* Binary filter counter */
00124    uint16              Padding;     /* Structure padding */
00125 
00126 } EVS_BinFilter_t;
00127 
00128 
00129 typedef struct
00130 {
00131     EVS_BinFilter_t    BinFilters[CFE_EVS_MAX_EVENT_FILTERS];  /* Array of binary filters */
00132 
00133     uint8              ActiveFlag;             /* Application event service active flag */
00134     uint8              EventTypesActiveFlag;   /* Application event types active flag */
00135     uint16             EventCount;             /* Application event counter */
00136     uint16             RegisterFlag;           /* Application has registered flag */
00137 
00138 } EVS_AppData_t;
00139 
00140 
00141 typedef struct {
00142    char                AppName[OS_MAX_API_NAME];               /* Application name */
00143    uint8               ActiveFlag;                             /* Application event service active flag */
00144    uint8               EventTypesActiveFlag;                   /* Application event types active flag */
00145    uint16              EventCount;                             /* Application event counter */
00146    EVS_BinFilter_t     Filters[CFE_EVS_MAX_EVENT_FILTERS];     /* Application event filters */
00147 
00148 } CFE_EVS_AppDataFile_t;
00149 
00150 
00151 /* Global data structure */
00152 typedef struct
00153 {
00154    EVS_AppData_t       AppData[CFE_ES_MAX_APPLICATIONS];    /* Application state data and event filters */
00155 
00156    CFE_EVS_Log_t      *EVS_LogPtr;    /* Pointer to the EVS log in the ES Reset area*/
00157                                          /* see cfe_es_global.h */
00158                                          
00159    /*
00160    ** EVS task data
00161    */
00162    CFE_EVS_TlmPkt_t    EVS_TlmPkt;
00163    CFE_SB_PipeId_t     EVS_CommandPipe;
00164    uint32              EVS_SharedDataMutexID;
00165    uint32              EVS_AppID;
00166 
00167 } CFE_EVS_GlobalData_t;

00175 int32 CFE_EVS_EarlyInit ( void );
